ciencias.first_question: Según el contenido analizado, Genera una pregunta multifácil acerca de: La photosynthesis es el proceso biológico más importante para la vida en la Tierra. Plants utilize the solar energy to convert carbon dioxide and water into glucose and oxygen.

historia.first_question: Según el contenido analizado, General question: How did the Industrial Revolution come about in England? Available choices: (1) The Industrial Revolution began in England at the end of the 19th century and transformed society. (2) The invention of the steam boiler by James Watt in 1769 revolutionized transport and production. (3) The invention of vapor machines by James Watt in 1769 revolutionized transport and production.
